==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{w|Makemo}} also known as ''Rangi-kemo'' or ''Te Paritua'', is an inhabited atoll in the {{w|Tuamotu}} archipelago of the {{w|French Polynesia}}.
* Makemo is the home of the Polynesian Hero ''Moeava'' the namesake of another [[Moeava|NPC]].
